game.name: Just Dismantle
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Relax and unwind as you dismantle entire maps, piece by piece. Gather valuable resources to upgrade your tools and skills while unlocking new areas in this satisfying deconstruction simulator. No rush, no pressure – just pure dismantling.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Relax and unwind as you dismantle entire maps, piece by piece. Gather valuable resources to upgrade your tools and skills while unlocking new areas in this satisfying deconstruction simulator. No rush, no pressure – just pure dismantling.
